task_text: Find me the least skilled person in German language (pick the one with more project work, if multiple match)

text_blocks: I found multiple employees with the lowest German skill level (level 2). I need to check if there are any with level 1, and then use project workload as the tiebreaker. Let me first check if anyone has skill level 1 in German, and then calculate the workloads for the tied employees.

Good - no employees have German skill level 1, so level 2 is the minimum. Now I need to calculate workloads for all employees with level 2 to find the one with the most project work. Let me get the full list of level 2 employees and calculate their workloads.
I have 20 employees with German skill level 2 (the lowest). Now I need to calculate workloads for all of them to find who has the most project work.
I have found the answer. Among all employees with the lowest German skill (level 2), **Giorgio Pellegrini (ayEi_045)** has the highest project workload at 1.3 FTE.

input.message:
